item.title: Avril Lavigne - Head Above Water
item.description:
I’ve gotta keep
the calm
Before
the storm
I don’t want less
I don’t want more
Must bar the windows
and the doors
To keep me safe
to keep me warm
Yeah my life is
what I’m fighting for

can’t reach the shore

As I fall down

there’s no heaven

to do
